# sparrow-authorizaion-server


获取登录token:
post /oauth/token?grant_type=password&username=sysadmin&password=password&client_id=sparrow-platform&client_secret=password

返回结果如下：
{
    "access_token": "eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..dUY-u--jDWAWfPauZD_3sV3QWKYxURMLGQa-Jhgbc_p-J5UjoS2RD5tWtqR8dPyNReJozT-JMeiQE3suw1bg4YrsTotompqx5H8jeme_ppXhJEqYo2wf73nhFJ6eUGcGR_36FpyyAkCHtafp3hGEDbiQoZC3g00zzI6Pnb594pMDOMeZqzS_Va7GNz98H5PTZzc_OypaNKX9dob7ATocixj4pEqU4jlz_um5BMsK5XC2LoN0NWtps95Ft4WduuXNC7aBZpX8YtG9v9eY0YrEkzAvfoanlp6DwPnBdKgMGqIcC0J59zZZ6vANGyyo6c5KLo1inhlwTXmocQfyefA-CA",
    "token_type": "bearer",
    "expires_in": 43199,
    "scope": "any",
    "jti": "1b63864b-3003-46b0-8df4-0cc059fb8443"
}
